backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing students with ID, name, PIN, and 12‑month fee array, supporting creation, login, fee updates, and queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend fee‑management components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script bootstrapping the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes for landing and fees pages with React Query provider.
frontend/src/features/fees/AdminPanel.ts: Admin UI for creating students, selecting existing ones, and toggling monthly paid/unpaid status using React Query.
frontend/src/features/fees/FeesApp.tsx: Wrapper component displaying tabs for Admin Panel and Student Login within the fee management system.
frontend/src/features/fees/months.ts: Constants and helpers for month labels and index lookup used across fee‑related components.
frontend/src/features/fees/MonthStatusCa: Grid component showing 12 monthly fee statuses with admin toggle mode and read‑only mode for students.
frontend/src/features/fees/phoneStore.ts: Provides helper functions to read, write, and delete student phone numbers in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/fees/queries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching students and mutating student data through the backend actor.
Student login interface allowing PIN authentication and viewing read‑only monthly payment status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets base Tailwind styles and defines extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/FeesPage.tsx: Renders the fee management page layout with header navigation and embeds the FeesApp component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with branding, navigation, hero content, and class information sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, extended theme settings, and plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a responsive marketing site plus a /fees mini‑app with persistent student fee tracking and PIN login. Lists architectural notes, features, and version info for build planning.
